about.short: I am enrolled at Carleton Universities Bachelor's of Information, Networking stream, in collaboration with Algonquin College

projects.title: SDN Non-Terrestrial-Network Emulation
projects.summary: Building virtual Non-Terrestrial Network using Mininet with OpenDaylight as the controller. We also are using Machine Learning to predict near-future link/path delay to aid in routing decisions.

projects.title: Nokia Data Centre Fabric Lab
projects.summary: Recreated lab environment we got to configure via a free offerring of Nokia's Data Center Fabric Fundamental Certification

projects.title: Resume Chat Bot
projects.summary: A chat bot that users can interact with to learn about myself, my skills, and my projects
